# The tidy extension

Configure the `tidy` extension.

This extension provides support for Tidy HTML utility support to handle HTML,
XHTML and XML documents.

## PHP_EXT_TIDY

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enable the extension.

## PHP_EXT_TIDY_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Build extension as shared.
